record.reply: Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree that the My EFQUEL Section is relevant?

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree with this statement, the eLearning Quality Tab is interesting?
Do you say that because you have not thought about it?
That is cool. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree that the Homepage of EFQUEL is well designed?
Do you say that because you have not thought about it?
I must say. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Some people believe that the eLearning Quality Tab is interesting.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you share that opinion?
You answered negatively, is that because you have not made up you mind?
Fair enough. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree that the News and Events Section is relevant?
Did you answer like that because you have not made up you mind?

Hmmn, interesting! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> This is all for this time. Thanks for your help in our evaluation. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Have a nice day. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
Farewell!
Auf wiedersehen!
Auf wiedersehen!
Adios!

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree that the EFQUEL WIKI Page is not easy to read?
Do you say that because you have not thought about it?
Ok! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree that the About Section is a good source?
Did you answer like that because you have not got a view?
Fair enough. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Some say that the EFQUEL Community is interactive.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you agree with that opinion?
Do you say that because you have not got an opinion?
I must say. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Some people believe that the EFQUEL WIKI Page is too complex.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you share that point of view?
Did you answer like that because you have not got a view?

I must say. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> This is all for this time. Thanks for your help in our evaluation. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Have a nice day. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
See you later!

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> When asked, some people claim that the Homepage of EFQUEL is well designed.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you agree with that sentence?
Do you say that because you have not thought about it?
Ok! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree with this statement, the News and Events Section is relevant?
Did you answer like that because you have not thought about it?
Hmmn, interesting! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> People have said to me that the My EFQUEL Section is relevant.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you share that point of view?
You answered negatively, is that because you have not got a view?
Hmmn, interesting! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree with this statement, the EFQUEL WIKI Page is not easy to read?
You answered negatively, is that because you have not thought about it?

I must say. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> This is all for this time. Thanks for your help in our evaluation. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Have a nice day. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
See you later!

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> People have said to me that the eLearning Quality Tab is interesting.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you agree with that opinion?

My mind was in another place, try and answer the question in another way, please? <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
People have said to me that the eLearning Quality Tab is interesting.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
Do you agree with that opinion?

You where a bit too sofisticated for me, could you say that in another way, please? <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
My mind was in another place, try and answer the question in another way, please?
People have said to me that the eLearning Quality Tab is interesting.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
Do you agree with that opinion?

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Some people believe that the EFQUEL WIKI Page is too complex.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you agree with that statement?

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> It has been observed that the EFQUEL WIKI Page is topical.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you share that idea?

Hello! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> I will be asking you a series of questions about the EFQUEL homepage. Please answer as honestly as possible. Well here we go! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Some people believe that the EFQUEL Community is interactive.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Do you agree?
I'll remember that. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree when some say that the Homepage of EFQUEL is too simple?
Did you answer like that because you have not thought about it?

Interesting view! because you meant no! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Here is another one. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree when some say that the Homepage of EFQUEL is well designed?
Ok! <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Would you agree with this statement, the About Section is a good source?
The About Section is a good source.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>Is that a true statement more often than not?

So you agree. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> This is all for this time. Thanks for your help in our evaluation. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/> Have a nice day. <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>
